channel.title: Praveen Yadav's Blog
channel.description: Hi I'm Praveen Yadav, a versatile javascript & golang developer and this is my blog. Here, I share my own experience as a developer and everything I'm learning about Golang, Typescript, React, testing and life

item.title: MDX bundler with Next.JS
item.description: MDX is just an extension of Markdown that allows you to import and write JSX in your markdown documents.
item.dc:creator: Praveen Yadav

item.title: Error handling in Golang
item.description: Unlike other language, golang does explicit error checking. In golang, errors are values and we can transform any type into error by implementing the error interface which has a single Error() method.
item.dc:creator: Praveen Yadav
